p: I have looked in 5 places for the decoration you need for your hat, and the best I could find I have mailed you today. There were some lovely birdie, etc. in colors, but this is all I could find in White. I hope it will be what you want!!
I do want you and Waddy to have a lovely trip and a good time. Please let me know where I can write you. I hear we have letters at home - I am eager to read them.
